original: mthong dang ma mthong la sgrol ba'i ;

translated: Liberating those seen and unseen.üîΩüîΩ

original: / gdugs dkar yum la phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: / gdugs dkar yum la phyag 'tshal te //
translated: I pay homage to the mother, the white parasol.üîΩ

original: bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of attaining that goal of self and other,üîΩ

original: lo 'dab tsam cig gsal bar bya //
analyzed: lo 'dab tsam cig gsal bar bya //
translated: I will clarify just the branches.üîΩ

original: de la 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: The yogi who wishes to accomplish the Noble Lady of the White ParasolüîΩshould do the following.

original: gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dangpo mandal dang mchod pa bshams la khrus bya ste /
analyzed: gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dangpo mandal dang mchod pa bshams la khrus bya ste /
translated: In a solitary place that is to your liking, first set out the mandala and offerings and then bathe.üîΩ

original: lus la des byugs nas gos gtsang ma bgos te /
analyzed: lus la des byugs nas gos gtsang ma bgos te /
translated: Having anointed his body with that, he should put on clean clothes.

original: stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should sit on a comfortable seat.üîΩ

original: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i steng du aom dkar po bsams te /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i steng du aom dkar po bsams te /
translated: Then, in one's heart, one should imagine a white Om on a moon.

original: de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang @185a * //
analyzed: de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang @185a * //
translated: Light radiates from that, and all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas of the ten directions

original: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te /
analyzed: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te /
translated: are visualized as Noble White Parasol.

original: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
translated: One should perform the sequence of prostrations, etc.

original: de nas chad med pa bzhi bsgoms te stong ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas chad med pa bzhi bsgoms te stong ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate on the four immeasurables and meditate on emptiness.

original: de ltar stong pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom dkar po bsams te /
analyzed: de ltar stong pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom dkar po bsams te /
translated: Thus, from emptiness, one should imagine a white Om on a moon-disk.

original: de nyid las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don byas te /
analyzed: de nyid las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don byas te /
translated: From that itself, light rays radiate into the ten directions, and having performed the welfare of living beings,

original: tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar po aom gyis mtshan par gyur te /
analyzed: tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar po aom gyis mtshan par gyur te /
translated: they gather back in and transform into a white parasol marked with an Om.

original: de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang bcas pa 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las dgrol te tshur 'dus pas 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can sku mdog dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang bcas pa 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las dgrol te tshur 'dus pas 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can sku mdog dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: They return and dissolve into the white form of Noble SitƒÅtapatrƒÅ, who is adorned with all ornaments.

original: phyag dang po gnyis kyis gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa /üîΩsprul pa'i dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba /
analyzed: phyag dang po gnyis kyis gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa / sprul pa'i dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba /
translated: Her first two hands hold a white parasol.üîΩShe has a thousand emanated heads and a thousand hands.

original: spyan bye ba phrag brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo /
analyzed: spyan bye ba phrag brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo /
translated: She has a hundred thousand eyes.

original: dbu la mi phyed rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can /
analyzed: dbu la mi phyed rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can /
translated: Her head is marked with the blazing, indivisible vajra.

original: sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa /
analyzed: sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa /
translated: She rules the ma·πá·∏çala of the three worlds.

original: bdag dang gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa /
translated: She protects oneself and others from all fears.

original: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te gnas par bsams te /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te gnas par bsams te /
translated: She is surrounded by a host of goddesses.

original: mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Bless the offerings and so forth.

original: de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar bhr'um las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa'i rgyan dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i nang du seng ge la sogs pa'i gdan rnams bskyed pa la /
analyzed: de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar bhr'um las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa'i rgyan dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i nang du seng ge la sogs pa'i gdan rnams bskyed pa la /
translated: Within that, one should generate the seats of the lion and so forth.

original: spyan drang ba ni snying ga'i aom gyi 'od kyis bskul te dmigs pa rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba ni snying ga'i aom gyi 'od kyis bskul te dmigs pa rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: The invocation is done by the light of the o·πÉ at the heart, and the visualized objects are invited with the libation.

original: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang / sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal bar dmigs te /
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang / sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal bar dmigs te /
translated: Moreover, one should visualize the assembly of buddhas and bodhisattvas, the assembly of ƒÅryas with white parasols, the assembly of consorts, and the assembly of emanations.

original: gzhung las byung ba'i phyag rgya dang bstod pa sngon du 'gor bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod do //
analyzed: gzhung las byung ba'i phyag rgya dang bstod pa sngon du 'gor bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod do //
translated: Having recited the previously mentioned mudras and praises, one should make offerings with the assembly of offerings.

original: de nas gsol ba btab ste bzlas pa ni bdag dang ye shes kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas ba'i yi ge mu tig gi rdog po lta bur bsams te /
analyzed: de nas gsol ba btab ste bzlas pa ni bdag dang ye shes kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas ba'i yi ge mu tig gi rdog po lta bur bsams te /
translated: Then, the recitation after supplicating is as follows: One should visualize the moon ma·πá·∏çala at one‚Äôs heart and the heart of the gnosis being, and the recitation syllables like pearls.

original: spro ba dang bsdu pa'i sbyor bas bzlas pa'i skyon spangs te bzlas ba bya'o //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu pa'i sbyor bas bzlas pa'i skyon spangs te bzlas ba bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra, avoiding the faults of recitation, by the process of emanating and reabsorbing.

original: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar @185b dmigs shing sems can gyi don dran pas bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar @185b dmigs shing sems can gyi don dran pas bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should recite the mantra while visualizing the homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, and while mindful of the welfare of sentient beings.

original: de nas ngal lam gtong bar 'dod na bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phul ta /
analyzed: de nas ngal lam gtong bar 'dod na bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phul ta /

original: bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
analyzed: bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
translated: The divine worker goddess should make offerings and praises to the Noble Ones.

original: bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas gshegs su gsol lo //
analyzed: bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas gshegs su gsol lo //
translated: One should request forbearance, dedicate the roots of virtue, and request the Noble Ones to depart.

original: de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should protect the body and rise.

original: langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Having risen, one should read the profound s≈´tras and so forth.

original: rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o //
analyzed: rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o //
translated: One should always be mindful of Noble SitƒÅtapatrƒÅ.

original: phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing 'byung po'i kha zas spangs te bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing 'byung po'i kha zas spangs te bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should make homage, visualize, and abandon the food of spirits.

original: srung ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / bzlog pa dang / spyin sreg dang / bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba dang / dmag dpung gzhom pa dang / dngos grub bsgrub pa dang / ser ba srung ba dang / sri'u gso ba dang / gtor ma btang ba dang /
analyzed: srung ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / bzlog pa dang / spyin sreg dang / bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba dang / dmag dpung gzhom pa dang / dngos grub bsgrub pa dang / ser ba srung ba dang / sri'u gso ba dang / gtor ma btang ba dang /
translated: Protection, yantras, averting, fire offerings, averting and suppressing obstacles, conquering armies, accomplishing siddhis, protecting against hail, reviving the dead, offering tormas,

original: mdze nad gso ba dang / 'jigs pa skyob pa kun dang po'i phan yon las 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: mdze nad gso ba dang / 'jigs pa skyob pa kun dang po'i phan yon las 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o //
translated: curing leprosy, and protecting from fear‚Äîall should be done according to the benefits that arise from the beginning.

original: bdag 'dra blo dman so so'i skye bo yis //
analyzed: bdag 'dra blo dman so so'i skye bo yis //
translated: By a lowly ordinary being like me,

original: 'phags ma mchog la chu yi thigs tsam bstod //
analyzed: 'phags ma mchog la chu yi thigs tsam bstod //
translated: a mere drop of praise to the supreme noble one,

original: 'di las skyes pa'i bsod nams gang byung bas //
analyzed: 'di las skyes pa'i bsod nams gang byung bas //
translated: whatever merit arises from this,üîΩmay I and all sentient beings attain the supreme.
